pkgmetadata.longdescription: Run Reports, Models, and Scripts from a Mobile Device // A framework for interacting with R modules such as Reports, Models, and Scripts from a mobile device. The framework allows you to list available modules and select a module of interest using a basic e-mail interface. After selecting a specific module, you can either run it as is or provide input via the e-mail interface. After parsing your request, R will send the results back to your mobile device.
